# distance(to:)

**Instance Method**

Returns the distance to another joint.

## Declaration

```swift
func distance(to joint: Joint) -> CGFloat
```

## Parameters

- **joint**: The joint for which to calculate the distance.

## Return Value

The calculated distance.
title: distance(to:)
